Rock paper scissors .io game

How to play

Use cursor keys to move.
Press r ("Rock"), p ("Paper"), or s ("Scissor") to place "coins":

How to win

Collect coins to change player's shape.
Your shape is deterimined by the type of coins you have most.

When you touch another player, you win or lose based on the rule of Rock paper scissors.
